short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download and save complete ChatGPT conversations locally, including regenerations and prompt edits, in a zip archive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPTSaver adds a button to your ChatGPT interface that lets you download your conversations locally. These conversations are stored locally and accessible offline for documentation, for example.
